thread.title: The Latest: Israel police shoot alleged Palestinian attacker
thread.title_full: The Latest: Israel police shoot alleged Palestinian attacker - US News

author: USNews
title: The Latest: Israel police shoot alleged Palestinian attacker
text:
The Latest: Police say officers shot Palestinian who tried to stab them in Jerusalem Palestinians burn tires during clashes with Israeli troops near Ramallah, West Bank, Friday, Oct. 16, 2015. Tensions and violence have been mounting in recent weeks, in part fueled by Palestinian fears that Israel is trying to expand its presence at a major Muslim-run shrine in Jerusalem, a claim Israel has denied.(AP Photo/Majdi Mohammed)
Associated Press Oct. 17, 2015 | 2:42 a.m. EDT + More JERUSALEM (AP) â€” The latest developments in a wave of Israeli-Palestinian violence (all times local).
___
9:40 a.m.
Israeli police say officers shot a Palestinian in Jerusalem who tried to stab them.
Police spokeswoman Luba Samri says officers approached a Palestinian who then pulled out a knife and tried to stab them. The officers opened fire and seriously wounded the assailant.
Earlier on Saturday, in the West Bank city of Hebron. Israel's military says an Israeli pedestrian shot and wounded a Palestinian who tried to stab him.
Over the past month, eight Israelis have been killed in Palestinian attacks, most of them stabbings. In that time, 31 Palestinians were killed by Israeli fire, including 14 labeled by Israel as attackers, and the rest in clashes with Israeli troops.
___
9:15 a.m.
The Israeli military says an Israeli in the West Bank has shot a Palestinian who tried to stab him.
Saturday's incident took place in a Jewish neighborhood of Hebron, a frequent flashpoint where a few hundred Jews live in close proximity to tens of thousands of Palestinians.
The military says the Israeli shot and wounded the Palestinian before the man could harm him. The Palestinian was being evacuated for treatment.
Over the past month, eight Israelis were killed in Palestinian attacks, most of them stabbings. In that time, 31 Palestinians were killed by Israeli fire, including 14 labeled by Israel as attackers, and the rest in clashes with Israeli troops.
